webradios.name: Fip
webradios.description: The world of Fip ... an eclectic music radio, not closing its office in any kind or any time: jazz, French chanson, world music, pop-rock, blues, electronic music, classical music, movie soundtracks. Fip broadcasts more than 300 different titles per day and still live. Voice Fip gives color to the antenna. The varied and uninterrupted music program is punctuated by appointment made ​​by a team of facilitators who unearths tips and essential cultural events.
